questions.questionText:
Four people called in the address of house that is on fire. The addresses they gave were:

Called #1 8647 Sinclair Avenue.

Caller #2: 8337 Sinclair Avenue.

Caller #3 7647 Sinclair Avenue.

Caller #4: 8697 Sinclair Avenue. Which of the following addresses is most likely correct?

options.text: 8647 Sinclair Avenue
8337 Sinclair Avenue
7647 Sinclair Avenue
8697 Sinclair Avenue

questions.questionText:
There was a traffic accident at a very busy intersection. Several witnesses described the accident as follows:

Witness #1: The vehicle that was struck was in the left turn lane. A drunk driver didn't stop for the red light and the accident occurred.

Witness #2 The vehicle that was struck started too quickly and was hit from the side by a drunk driver.

Witness #3: The vehicle that was struck was in the left turn lane and was beginning to turn when a blue Chevy came out of nowhere.

Witness #4: A drunken man driving very fast and ran the red light. Which of the following scenarios is most likely correct?

options.text: A drunken man was driving very fast and ran a red light.
The vehicle that was struck was in the left turn lane and a drunk driver didnâ€™t stop for the red light.
The vehicle that was struck started too quickly and was hit from the side by a drunk driver
The vehicle that was struck was in the left turn lane and was beginning to turn when a blue Chevy came out of nowhere.

questions.questionText:
A group of children were seen playing with matches near an abandoned house. A fire resulted and the house burnt down. Four witnesses provided descriptions of the children as follows:

Witness #1: Older children wearing baggy clothing.

Witness #2: White children wearing baggy clothing.

Witness #3: White children that were cursing a great deal.

Witness #4: Hispanic children wearing very large clothing.

Which of the following descriptions of the children is most likely correct?

options.text: A group of Hispanic children wearing very large clothing
A group of older children wearing baggy clothing
A group of white children that were cursing a great deal
A group of white children wearing baggy clothing

questions.questionText:
Several witnesses provided the license plate numbers and letters of a vehicle involved in a hit-and-run accident. The license plate numbers and letters the witnesses provided for the vehicle that fled from the accident were:

Witness #1: 467F7.

Witness #2: 46TFT.

Witness #3: F67PT.

Witness #4: 467FT.

Which of these license plate numbers is most likely correct?

options.text: 46TFT
F67PT
467FT

questions.questionText:
A little girl did not come home from school as she had promised. Four people who saw the child earlier that day described her as wearing:

Person #1: Jeans, a white T-shirt, a blue denim jacket, and white canvas sneakers.

Person #2: Blue pants, a white tank top, and white sneakers.

Person #3: Dark jeans, and a white button down blouse with short sleeves.

Person #4: Blue jeans, a white tank top, and a sweatshirt tied around her waist.

Which of the following descriptions of the girl is most likely correct?

options.text: Blue jeans, a white T-shirt, a blue denim jacket, and white canvas sneakers.
Blue jeans, a white tank top, and white sneakers.
Jeans and a white button down blouse.
Blue jeans, a white tank top, and a sweatshirt tied around her waist.
